Contact Me

I'm Andrew, a 31 Year Old Full Stack Developer

Currently living in Raleigh, NC with my partner and best friend Lisa. We have a dog, Magnolia, and two cats - Beaux and Zubi.

My ideal tech stack is Deno, React, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Next.js and TailwindCSS. I have a digital agency/creative studio I started called Tar Heel Dev Studio and that is where I try to get most of my freelance work through, but do get job requests on this portfolio page as well. My goal is to be able to hire another developer within the next year so I can share some of the burden of work with another person! If you need to get a hold of me or have any questions, please don't hesitate to fill out my contact form or email me, both which you can do by clicking the corresponding button below.

Contact me Email Me

My Newsletter

Get my weekly newsletter directly to your inbox every week. I talk about coding, psychology, business, and life.
